data.title: Duke University
data.meta_description: Duke University is a private research university in Durham, North Carolina, United States.
data.meta_site_name: The Foundation for Individual Rights and Expression
data.text:
The 2024 College Free Speech Rankings are based on the voices of over 55,000 currently enrolled students at over 250 colleges. The rankings are based on a number of factors, including openness, tolerance, self-expression, administrative support for free speech, and campus policies.

Explore College Free Speech Rankings
